name: AwesomeNanny
0:
”Alexa, Ask Awesome nanny to set 4 ounces.”
”Alexa, Ask Awesome Nanny when was the last feeding?”
”Alexa, Ask Awesome nanny what was the total feeding in last 3 hours?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: awesome nanny
des:
Awesome Nanny, is a feeding time organizer. Ask nanny to set the next feeding time.Once set, you can Ask nanny when is the next feeding time. You can set the feeding quantity and ask alexa to get the counts and quantity of feedings in last n hours. You can get the feedings for maximum of last 24 hours. Feeding data is kept for 7 days and then deleted.

Usages:

Alexa, ask awesome nanny to set next feeding time in 3 hours.
Response: New Feeding time is recorded, Next feeding is in 3 hours

Alexa, ask awesome nanny when is the next feeding time?
Response: Next feeding is in 2 hours 59 minutes

Alexa, ask awesome nanny to set 4 ounces.
Response: New feeding time is now recorded !!! Feed quantity was 4 ounces

Alexa, ask awesome nanny when was the last feeding?
Response: Last Feeding was 5 minutes ago and the Last feed quantity was 4 ounces

Alexa, ask awesome nanny what was the total feeding in last 3 hours?
Response: Total number of feedings in last 3 hours was 2 and Total feeding quantity was 8 ounces.

Alexa, ask awesome nanny to delete the last feeding.
Response: Last Feeding record from 5 minutes ago was deleted
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
